modul.name: PulseLfo

vardef.name: phi
vardef.description: Initial phase of LFO (negativ to skip initialisation)

modul.opcode: /* Pulse low frequency oscillator (clock signal) */ opcode PulseLfo, k, kki kfrq, kamp, iphi xin kfrq limit kfrq, 0, 100 kamp limit kamp, 0, 50000 iphi limit iphi, -1, 1 kout oscil kamp, kfrq, gipulselfo, iphi xout kout endop
